Utility methods related to using the CreatureTemplate class more efficiently. An alternative to setting all properties manually.

Methods

SetCreatureDataEssentials(CreatureTemplate, CellLevel, float, float, BehaviourLODData, float)

Sets the most commonly used properties relating to creature data.

Assigns the following properties so that you don't have to:

  • CellLevel
  • Mass
  • EyeFOV
  • BehaviourLODData
  • BioReactorCharge
public static void SetCreatureDataEssentials(CreatureTemplate template, LargeWorldEntity.CellLevel cellLevel, float mass, float eyeFov = 0, BehaviourLODData behaviourLod = default, float bioReactorCharge = 200)

Parameters

template CreatureTemplate

The creature template to modify.

cellLevel CellLevel

Roughly determines how far this creature can be loaded in.

mass float

Mass in kg. Ranges from about 1.8f to 4050f. Default is 15kg.

eyeFov float

The FOV is used for detecting things such as prey. SHOULD BE NEGATIVE! This value has an expected range of [-1, 0]. Is 0f by default. A value of -1 means a given object is ALWAYS in view.

behaviourLod BehaviourLODData

Determines the distance for which certain calculations (such as Trail Managers) perform (or don't). It is recommended to increase these values for large creatures.

bioReactorCharge float

Total power output of this creature. All ECC creatures can be put in the bioreactor as long as this value is greater than 0.

SetCreatureMotionEssentials(CreatureTemplate, SwimRandomData, StayAtLeashData)

Sets the most commonly used properties relating to creature motion.

Assigns the following properties so that you don't have to:

  • SwimRandomData
  • StayAtLeashData
public static void SetCreatureMotionEssentials(CreatureTemplate template, SwimRandomData swimRandom, StayAtLeashData stayAtLeash)

Parameters

template CreatureTemplate

The creature template to modify.

swimRandom SwimRandomData

Contains data pertaining to the SwimRandom action.

stayAtLeash StayAtLeashData

Contains data pertaining to the StayAtLeashPosition action. This component keeps creatures from wandering too far.

SetPreyEssentials(CreatureTemplate, float, PickupableFishData, EdibleData)

Sets properties related to generic prey creatures. Adds basic fear elements and allows it to be picked up and eaten.

Assigns the following properties so that you don't have to:

  • ScareableData
  • FleeWhenScaredData
  • PickupableFishData
  • EdibleData
public static void SetPreyEssentials(CreatureTemplate template, float fleeVelocity, PickupableFishData pickupable, EdibleData edible)

Parameters

template CreatureTemplate

The creature template to modify.

fleeVelocity float

The velocity in m/s at which the creature swims away from the player and other perceived threats.

pickupable PickupableFishData

Contains data pertaining to picking up and/or holding fish in your hands.

edible EdibleData

Contains data pertaining to the Eatable [sic] component.
